source: Democrat Kyrsten Sinema wins Arizona Senate election as Martha McSally concedes. Democrats netted another Senate seat Monday night after Republican Martha McSally conceded Arizona’s race to Democrat Kyrsten Sinema.
Kyrsten Sinema wins Arizona Senate race in breakthrough for Democrats. Sinema becomes state’s first female senator after a lengthy vote count in one of the most closely watched midterm races
Democrat Kyrsten Sinema Wins Arizona Senate Race. After tight contest, the moderate is elected state’s first Democratic senator in 30 years
target: Democrat Kyrsten Sinema Wins Arizona Senate Race. After a tight contest, Democrat Kyrsten Sinema wins the Arizona Senate race and becomes the first female Senator from that state.
